    131Light.prototype.turnOn = function (level, rate, next) {
    147 var id = this.id;
    157 if (typeof rate === 'function') {
    162 next = rate;
    172 rate = null;
    185 } else if (typeof level === 'function') {

    210 rate = null;

    191var Insteon = function () {

    2852 this.defaultTempUnits = Insteon.defaultTempUnits;

    811Insteon.prototype.sendCommand = function (cmd, timeout, next) {
    82112 if (typeof timeout === 'function') {
    830 next = timeout;
    840 timeout = null;
    85 }
    86112 if (typeof cmd === 'string') {
    8720 cmd = {
    88 raw: '02' + cmd,
    89 type: cmd
    90 };
    91 }
    92112 timeout = timeout || this.commandTimeout;
    93
    94112 var deferred = Q.defer();
    95
    96112 var status = {command: cmd, deferred: deferred, timeout: timeout};
    97
    98112 sendCommand(this, status);
    99
    100112 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    101};
    102
    1031function sendCommand(gw, status) {
    104224 if(!status) {
    105110 return;
    106 }
    107
    108114 if(gw.status) {
    1092 debug('Already running a command - queuing command: %j', cmd);
    1102 return gw.queue.push(status);
    111 }
    112
    113112 var cmd = status.command;
    114112 var timeout = status.timeout;
    115112 gw.status = status;
    116
    117112 debug('Send: %j', status);
    118
    119112 setTimeout(function() { // slowing down writes reduces errors
    120112 try {
    121112 gw.socket.write(status.command.raw, 'hex');
    122 } catch (err) {
    1230 debug('Error writing to socket', err);
    1240 status.deferred.reject(err);
    1250 delete gw.timeout;
    1260 delete gw.status;
    1270 return sendCommand(gw, gw.queue.shift());
    128 }
    129112 gw.timeout = setTimeout(function() {
    1301 sendCommandTimout(gw, timeout, gw.commandRetries);
    131 }, timeout);
    132 }, 10);
    133
    134}
    135
    1361function sendCommandTimout(gw, timeout, retries) {
    1372 var status = gw.status;
    1382 debug('sendCommandTimout - status: %j', status);
    1392 var resp = status.command.response;
    1402 if(retries-- <= 0 || (resp && resp.standard && status.command.waitForExtended )) { // don't retry if we got a standard response
    1411 delete gw.timeout;
    1421 delete gw.status;
    1431 status.deferred.resolve(status);
    1441 sendCommand(gw, gw.queue.shift());
    145 } else {
    1461 debug('Resend: %j', status);
    1471 try {
    1481 gw.socket.write(status.command.raw, 'hex');
    149 } catch (err) {
    1500 debug('Error writing to socket', err);
    1510 status.deferred.reject(err);
    1520 delete gw.timeout;
    1530 delete gw.status;
    1540 return sendCommand(gw, gw.queue.shift());
    155 }
    1561 gw.timeout = setTimeout(function() {
    1571 sendCommandTimout(gw, timeout, retries);
    158 }, timeout);
    159 }
    160}
    161
    162
    1631Insteon.prototype.directCommand = function (id, cmd, param, timeout, next) {
    16477 if (typeof param === 'function') {
    1656 next = param;
    1666 param = '00';
    16771 } else if (typeof timeout === 'function') {
    1688 next = timeout;
    1698 timeout = null;
    170 }
    17177 if (typeof param === 'number') {
    1720 timeout = param;
    1730 param = '00';
    174 }
    17577 if(!param) {
    17660 param = '00';
    177 }
    17877 if (typeof cmd === 'string') {
    17920 cmd = {
    180 cmd1: cmd,
    181 cmd2: param
    182 };
    183 }
    184
    18577 id = id || '';
    18677 id = id.trim().replace('.', '');
    187
    18877 if(!/^[0-9a-fA-F]{6}$/.test(id)) {
    1890 var msg = 'Invalid Insteon ID - ' + id;
    1900 debug(msg);
    1910 var deferred = Q.defer();
    1920 deferred.reject(new Error(msg));
    1930 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    194 }
    195
    19677 var type = cmd.type = '62';
    19777 var userData = '';
    19877 var flags = '0F'; // standard command
    19977 if (cmd.extended) {
    20054 flags = '1F';
    20154 var pad = '0000000000000000000000000000';
    20254 userData = (cmd.userData ? cmd.userData.join('') : '');
    20354 userData = userData.substring(0, pad.length);
    20454 userData = userData + pad.substring(0, pad.length - userData.length);
    205
    206 // create checksum for i2cs devices
    20754 var fullCmd = cmd.cmd1 + cmd.cmd2 + userData;
    20854 if(cmd.crc) {
    2094 userData = userData.substring(0, pad.length - 4) + genCrc(fullCmd);
    210 } else {
    211
    21250 var checksum = 0;
    21350 fullCmd.match(/.{1,2}/g).forEach(function(b) {
    214800 checksum += parseInt(b, 16);
    215 });
    216
    21750 checksum = ((~checksum) + 1) & 255;
    21850 cmd.checksum = checksum;
    21950 userData = userData.substring(0, pad.length - 2) + toByte(checksum);
    220 }
    221 }
    222
    22377 cmd.raw = '02' + type + id + flags + cmd.cmd1 + cmd.cmd2 + userData;
    22477 cmd.id = id;
    225
    22677 return this.sendCommand(cmd, timeout, next);
    227
    228};
    229
    2301function genCrc (cmd) {
    2314 var crc = 0;
    2324 cmd.substring(0, 28).match(/.{1,2}/g).forEach(function(byte) {
    23356 byte = parseInt(byte, 16);
    23456 for(var bit = 0; bit < 8; bit++) {
    235448 var fb = byte & 1;
    236448 fb = (crc & 0x8000) ? fb ^ 1 : fb;
    237448 fb = (crc & 0x4000) ? fb ^ 1 : fb;
    238448 fb = (crc & 0x1000) ? fb ^ 1 : fb;
    239448 fb = (crc & 0x0008) ? fb ^ 1 : fb;
    240448 crc = (crc << 1) & 0xFFFF | fb;
    241448 byte = byte >> 1;
    242 }
    243 });
    2444 return toByte(crc, 2);
    245}
    246
    247
    2481Insteon.prototype.checkStatus = function () {
    249269 var raw = this.buffer;
    250269 debug('checkStatus - buffer: %s', raw);
    251269 var status = this.status;
    252269 debug('checkStatus - status: %j', status);
    253
    254269 var cmd;
    255269 if(raw.length <= 2) {
    2564 return; // buffering
    257 }
    258
    259265 var nextCmdAt = raw.substr(2).search(/02(5[0-8]|6[0-9a-f]|7[0-3])/i);
    260265 if(nextCmdAt > 0) {
    26148 this.buffer = raw.substr(nextCmdAt+2);
    262 }
    263
    264265 var type = raw.substr(0, 4);
    265
    266265 var msgType;
    267265 switch(type.toUpperCase()) {
    268 case '0250': // Standard Command
    26994 debug('checkStatus - Standard Command');
    27094 if(raw.length < 22) {
    2710 return; // still buffering
    272 }
    27394 this.buffer = raw.substr(22);
    27494 cmd = parseRecieved(raw);
    27594 debug('Parsed command: %j', cmd);
    27694 debug('Status: %j', status);
    27794 msgType = cmd.standard.messageType;
    27894 if(!status || !status.command || !status.command.id ||
    279 (status.command.id.toUpperCase() !== cmd.standard.id.toUpperCase())) { // command isn't a response for a command we sent
    28018 this.emit('command', cmd);
    28118 break;
    282 }
    28376 if(!status.response) {
    28470 status.response = {};
    285 }
    28676 var responseCount = status.command.responseCount;
    28776 if(responseCount) {
    2882 status.response.standard = status.response.standard || [];
    2892 status.response.standard.push(cmd.standard);
    2902 status.success = status.response.standard.length === responseCount;
    291 } else {
    29274 status.response.standard = cmd.standard;
    29374 status.success = cmd.standard !== undefined && cmd.standard !== null &&
    294 (!status.command.extended || status.command.isStandardResponse) &&
    295 !status.command.waitForExtended && !status.command.waitForLinking;
    296 }
    297
    29876 break;
    299 case '0251': // Extended Command
    30035 debug('checkStatus - Extended Command');
    30135 if(raw.length < 50) {
    3020 return; // still buffering
    303 }
    30435 this.buffer = raw.substr(50);
    30535 cmd = parseRecieved(raw);
    30635 debug('Parsed command: %j', cmd);
    30735 debug('Status: %j', status);
    30835 msgType = cmd.extended.messageType;
    30935 if(!status ||
    310 status.command.id.toUpperCase() !== cmd.extended.id.toUpperCase()) { // command isn't a response for a command we sent
    3110 this.emit('command', cmd);
    3120 break;
    313 }
    31435 if(!status.response) {
    3150 status.response = {};
    316 }
    31735 status.response.extended = cmd.extended;
    31835 status.success = cmd.extended !== undefined && cmd.extended !== null;
    31935 break;
    320 case '0253': // Link Command
    3217 debug('checkStatus - Link Command');
    3227 if(raw.length < 20) {
    3230 return; // still buffering
    324 }
    3257 this.buffer = raw.substr(20);
    3267 cmd = parseRecieved(raw);
    3277 if(!status) {
    3280 this.emit('command', cmd);
    3290 break;
    330 }
    3317 if(!status.response) {
    3322 status.response = {};
    333 }
    3347 status.response.link = cmd.link;
    3357 status.success = cmd.link !== undefined && cmd.link !== null;
    3367 break;
    337 case '0257'://
    3387 debug('checkStatus - Link Record Command');
    3397 if(raw.length < 20) {
    3400 return; // still buffering
    341 }
    3427 if(!status) {
    3430 return;
    344 }
    3457 this.buffer = raw.substr(20);
    3467 status.response = {};
    3477 status.response.raw = raw;
    3487 status.response.type = raw.substr(2, 2);
    3497 status.response.link = parseLinkRecord(raw.substr(4,16));
    3507 status.success = true;
    3517 break;
    352 case '0258'://
    3536 debug('checkStatus - ALL-Link Cleanup Status Report');
    3546 if(raw.length < 6) {
    3550 return; // still buffering
    356 }
    3576 if(!status) {
    3580 return;
    359 }
    3606 this.buffer = raw.substr(6);
    3616 status.report = {
    362 completed: raw.substr(4, 2) === '06',
    363 aborted: raw.substr(4, 2) === '15'
    364 };
    3656 status.success = true;
    3666 break;
    367 case '0260': // Get IM Info
    3684 debug('checkStatus - Get IM Info Command');
    3694 if(raw.length < 18) {
    3700 return; // still buffering
    371 }
    3724 if(!status) {
    3730 return;
    374 }
    3754 this.buffer = raw.substr(18);
    3764 status.ack =raw.substr(16, 2) === '06';
    3774 status.nack =raw.substr(16, 2) === '15';
    3784 status.response = parseGetInfo(raw.substr(0,16));
    3794 status.success = true;
    3804 break;
    381 case '0261': // ALL-Link Command
    3826 debug('checkStatus - ALL-Link Command');
    3836 if(raw.length < 10) {
    3840 return; // still buffering
    385 }
    3866 if(!status) {
    3870 this.buffer = raw.substr(10);
    3880 break; // TODO: this.emit('command', parsedCmd);
    389 }
    3906 if(raw.length < 12) {
    3910 return; // still buffering
    392 }
    393
    3946 this.buffer = raw.substr(12);
    3956 status.ack =raw.substr(10, 2) === '06';
    3966 status.nack =raw.substr(10, 2) === '15';
    3976 break;
    398 case '0262':
    39980 debug('checkStatus - Direct Command');
    40080 if(raw.length < status.command.raw.length + 2) {
    4014 return; // still buffering
    402 }
    40376 this.buffer = raw.substr(status.command.raw.length + 2);
    40476 if(!status) {
    4050 break; // TODO: this.emit('command', parsedCmd);
    406 }
    40776 status.ack = raw.substr(status.command.raw.length, 2) === '06';
    40876 status.nack = raw.substr(status.command.raw.length, 2) === '15';
    40976 break;
    410 case '0264':
    4117 if(!status) {
    4120 return;
    413 }
    4147 if(raw.length < 10) {
    4150 return; // still buffering
    416 }
    4177 this.buffer = raw.substr(10);
    4187 status.ack = raw.substr(8, 2) === '06';
    4197 status.nack = raw.substr(8, 2) === '15';
    4207 status.success = !status.command.waitForLinking;
    4217 break;
    422 case '0265':
    4237 if(!status) {
    4240 return;
    425 }
    4267 if(raw.length < 6) {
    4270 return; // still buffering
    428 }
    4297 this.buffer = raw.substr(6);
    4307 status.ack =raw.substr(4, 2) === '06';
    4317 status.nack =raw.substr(4, 2) === '15';
    4327 status.success = true;
    4337 break;
    434 case '0269':
    435 case '026A':
    4369 if(!status) {
    4370 return;
    438 }
    4399 if(raw.length < 6) {
    4400 return; // still buffering
    441 }
    4429 this.buffer = raw.substr(6);
    4439 status.ack =raw.substr(4, 2) === '06';
    4449 status.nack =raw.substr(4, 2) === '15';
    4459 break;
    446 case '026F':
    4472 if(!status) {
    4480 return;
    449 }
    4502 if(raw.length < 24) {
    4510 return; // still buffering
    452 }
    4532 this.buffer = raw.substr(24);
    4542 status.ack =raw.substr(22, 2) === '06';
    4552 status.nack =raw.substr(22, 2) === '15';
    4562 status.command.code = raw.substr(4, 2);
    4572 if(status.command.code !== '00' && status.command.code !== '01') {
    4582 status.success = status.ack;
    459 }
    4602 break;
    461 default:
    4621 if(this.buffer.length > raw.length) {
    4630 this.buffer = this.buffer.substr(raw.length);
    464 } else {
    4651 this.buffer = '';
    466 }
    467 }
    468261 debug('checkStatus - status (after parsing): %j', status);
    469261 if(status) {
    470251 if(status.command.exitOnAck) {
    47110 status.success = status.ack;
    472 }
    473251 if(status.nack || (status.success && status.ack)) {
    474111 if(this.timeout) {
    475111 clearTimeout(this.timeout);
    476111 delete this.timeout;
    477 }
    478111 delete this.status;
    479111 status.deferred.resolve(status);
    480111 sendCommand(this, this.queue.shift());
    481
    482 }
    483 }
    484261 if(this.buffer.length > 2) { // needs to be at least a full command
    48527 this.checkStatus();
    486 }
    487};
    488
    4891function parseRecieved(raw) {
    490136 var resp = {};
    491136 var type;
    492136 while((type = /^02(5[013])/.exec(raw))) {
    493142 if (type[1] === '51') {
    49435 resp.extended = parseMessageRecieved(raw);
    49535 raw = raw.substr(resp.extended.raw.length);
    496107 } else if (type[1] === '50') {
    49799 resp.standard = parseMessageRecieved(raw);
    49899 raw = raw.substr(resp.standard.raw.length);
    499 } else {
    5008 resp.link = parseLinkingComplete(raw);
    5018 raw = raw.substr(resp.link.raw.length);
    502 }
    503 }
    504136 return resp;
    505}
    506
    5071function parseMessageRecieved(raw) {
    508134 var cmd = {};
    509134 cmd.type = raw.substr(2, 2);
    510134 if (cmd.type !== '51' && cmd.type !== '50') {
    5110 return null;
    512 }
    513134 cmd.id = raw.substr(4, 6);
    514134 cmd.gatewayId = raw.substr(10, 6);
    515134 var typeFlag = parseInt(raw.substr(16, 1), 16);
    516134 cmd.extended = typeFlag & 1 !== 0; // bit mask 0001
    517134 cmd.messageType = typeFlag >> 1;
    518134 var hopFlag = parseInt(raw.substr(17, 1), 16);
    519134 cmd.hopsLeft = hopFlag >> 2;
    520134 cmd.maxHops = hopFlag & 3; // bit mask 0011
    521134 cmd.command1 = raw.substr(18, 2);
    522134 cmd.command2 = raw.substr(20, 2);
    523
    524134 if (cmd.extended) {
    52535 cmd.userData = [];
    52635 for(var i = 0; i < 14; i++) {
    527490 cmd.userData.push(raw.substr(22+(i*2), 2));
    528 }
    52935 cmd.raw = raw.substr(0, (25*2));
    530 } else {
    53199 cmd.raw = raw.substr(0, (11*2));
    532 }
    533134 return cmd;
    534}
    535
    5361function parseGetInfo(raw) {
    5374 var resp = {};
    5384 resp.raw = raw;
    5394 resp.type = raw.substr(2, 2);
    5404 resp.id = raw.substr(4, 6);
    5414 resp.deviceCategory = { id: parseInt(raw.substr(10, 2), 16) };
    5424 resp.deviceCategory.name = DEV_CAT_NAMES[resp.deviceCategory.id];
    5434 resp.deviceSubcategory = { id: parseInt(raw.substr(12, 2), 16) };
    5444 resp.firmwareVersion = raw.substr(14, 2);
    5454 return resp;
    546}
    547
    548
    5491function parseLinkRecord(raw) {
    55036 var link = {};
    55136 var flags = parseInt(raw.substr(0, 2), 16);
    55236 link.controller = (flags & 64) !== 0; // bit mask 0100 0000
    55336 link.isInUse = (flags & 128) !== 0; // bit mask 1000 0000
    55436 link.hasBeenUsed = (flags & 2) !== 0; // bit mask 0000 0010
    55536 link.isLast = flags === 0;
    55636 link.group = parseInt(raw.substr(2, 2), 16);
    55736 link.id = raw.substr(4, 6);
    55836 link.data = [raw.substr(10, 2), raw.substr(12, 2), raw.substr(14, 2)];
    55936 return link;
    560}
    561
    5621function parseLinkingComplete(raw) {
    5638 var r = /^02(53)(\w{2})(\w{2})(\w{6})(\w{2})(\w{2})(\w{2})/.exec(raw);
    5648 if (!r) { return {}; }
    5658 var devCatId = parseInt(r[5], 16);
    5668 return {
    567 raw: r[0],
    568 type: r[1],
    569 controller: r[2] === '01',
    570 wasDeleted: r[2].toUpperCase() === 'FF',
    571 group: parseInt(r[3], 16),
    572 id: r[4],
    573 deviceCategory: {
    574 id: devCatId,
    575 name: DEV_CAT_NAMES[devCatId]
    576 },
    577 deviceSubcategory: {id: parseInt(r[5], 16)},
    578 firmwareVersion: r[6]
    579 };
    580}

    584
    585/**************************************************************************
    586 * Linking Functions
    587 **************************************************************************/
    588
    589/**
    590 * link or unlink a device(s) to the gateway
    591 *
    592 * options object:
    593 * {
    594 * controller: Boolean
    595 * group: Number,
    596 * timeout: Number,
    597 * unlink: Boolean
    598 * }
    599 *
    600 * default values:
    601 * {
    602 * controller: false,
    603 * group: 1, // contoller group/button
    604 * timeout: 30 // 30 secondes to press set button - hurry up
    605 * unlink: false
    606 * }
    607 *
    608 *
    609 *
    610 * @param {String|Array} device
    611 * @param {Object} options
    612 * @param {Function} next
    613 */
    6141Insteon.prototype.link = function () {
    6155 var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
    6165 return link.apply(null, [this, false, null].concat(args));
    617};
    618
    619/**
    620 * Unlink a device from the gateway.
    621 *
    622 * @param {String} controller
    623 * @param {String|Array} responder
    624 * @param {Object} options
    625 * @param {Function} next
    626 */
    6271Insteon.prototype.unlink = function () {
    6281 var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
    6291 return link.apply(null, [this, true, null].concat(args));
    630};
    631
    6321function link(gw, unlink, links, device, options, next) {
    633
    6346 if (typeof options === 'function') {
    6351 next = options;
    6361 options = null;
    6371 if (!Array.isArray(device) && typeof device === 'object') {
    6381 options = device;
    6391 device = null;
    640 }
    6415 } else if (typeof device === 'function') {
    6421 next = device;
    6431 device = null;
    644 }
    6456 var defaults = {
    646 controller: false,
    647 group: 1,
    648 timeout: 30000, // only used for manual linking (i.e. waiting for set button)
    649 unlink: unlink
    650 };
    651
    6526 options = utils.assignDefaults(defaults, options);
    653
    6546 debug('link options: %j', options);
    655
    6566 var gwCmd = {
    657 type: '64',
    658 group: options.group,
    659 waitForLinking: !device,
    660 raw: (
    661 options.unlink ? '0264FF' : (
    662 options.controller ? '026400' : '026401')
    663 ) + toByte(options.group)
    664 };
    665
    6666 var allLinkCmd = {
    667 cmd1: options.unlink ? '0A' :'09',
    668 cmd2: '00',
    669 extended: !options.unlink,
    670 waitForLinking: true
    671 };
    672
    673
    6746 var deferred = Q.defer();
    675
    6766 if (options.controller) {
    677 // Make sure all linkng is cancel before trying to create a link
    6781 deferred.resolve(
    679 gw.cancelLinking()
    680 .then(function () {
    6811 if(device) { // device is controller
    6821 if(Array.isArray(device)){
    6830 device = device.pop(); // When device is controller only one device supported
    684 }
    6851 allLinkCmd.cmd2 = toByte(options.group);
    6861 allLinkCmd.isStandardResponse = true;
    687
    6881 return sendLinkCommand(gw, gwCmd)
    689 .then(function () {
    6901 return gw.directCommand(device, allLinkCmd);
    691 })
    692 .then(function (status) {
    6931 if(status.response) {
    6941 return status.response.link;
    695 } else {
    6960 return null;
    697 }
    698 });
    699 } else { // unknown device is controller - press set button prior to calling function
    7000 return sendLinkCommand(gw, gwCmd);
    701 }
    702 })
    703 );
    704 } else { // gw is contoller
    7055 if (device) {
    7063 deferred.resolve(
    707 linkResponders(gw, links, device, gwCmd, allLinkCmd)
    708 );
    709 } else { // unknown device is responder -- press set button
    710 // Make sure all linkng is cancel before trying to create a link
    7112 deferred.resolve(
    712 gw.cancelLinking()
    713 .then(function (){
    7142 return sendLinkCommand(gw, gwCmd, options.timeout);
    715 })
    716
    717 );
    718 }
    719 }
    7206 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    721}
    722
    7231function sendLinkCommand(gw, cmd, timeout) {
    7243 debug('sendLinkCommand: %j', cmd);
    7253 return gw.sendCommand(cmd, timeout)
    726 .then(function (status) {
    7273 if(status.response) {
    7282 return status.response.link;
    729 } else {
    7301 return null;
    731 }
    732 });
    733}
    734
    7351function linkResponders(gw, links, devices, gwCmd, allLinkCmd) {
    7364 debug(
    737 'linkResponders - links: %j, devices: %j, gwCmd: %j, allLinkCmd: %j',
    738 links, devices, gwCmd, allLinkCmd
    739 );
    7404 var responder;
    7414 if (!Array.isArray(devices)) {
    7422 responder = devices;
    7432 devices = [];
    744 } else {
    7452 links = links || [];
    7462 responder = devices.shift();
    747 }
    748 // Make sure all linkng is cancel before trying to create a link
    7494 return gw.cancelLinking()
    750 .then(function () {
    7514 gwCmd.exitOnAck = true;
    7524 return gw.sendCommand(gwCmd);
    753 })
    754 .then(function (gwStatus) {
    7554 if (!gwStatus.ack) {
    7560 debug('linkResponders - gwStatus: %j', gwStatus);
    7570 return null;
    758 }
    7594 allLinkCmd.waitForLinking = true;
    760
    7614 return gw.directCommand(responder, allLinkCmd)
    762 .then(function (status) {
    7634 if (!status) {
    7640 return null;
    765 }
    7664 if (devices.length === 0) {
    7673 if (links) {
    7681 if(status.response) {
    7691 links.push(status.response.link);
    770 }
    7711 return links;
    772 } else {
    7732 if(status.response) {
    7742 return status.response.link;
    775 } else {
    7760 return null;
    777 }
    778 }
    779 } else {
    7801 if(status.response) {
    7811 links.push(status.response.link);
    782 }
    7831 return linkResponders(gw, links, devices, gwCmd, allLinkCmd);
    784 }
    785 });
    786 });
    787}
    788
    789
    790/**
    791 * Cancel linking/unlinking
    792 *
    793 * @param {Function} next
    794 */
    7951Insteon.prototype.cancelLinking = function (next) {
    7967 debug('insteon.cancelLinking');
    7977 return this.sendCommand('65', next);
    798};
    799
    800/**
    801 * Gets the links of a device or the gateway. Links are returned in the
    802 * callback as an Array of link Objects.
    803 *
    804 * @param {String} id
    805 * @param {Function} next
    806 */
    8071Insteon.prototype.links = function (id, next) {
    8089 if (typeof id === 'function') {
    8091 next = id;
    8101 id = null;
    811 }
    8129 debug('insteon.links - id: %j', id);
    8139 if (id && id.length === 6) {
    8147 return this.linkAt(id, 4095, [], next); // start at 0xFFF (4095)
    815 } else {
    8162 return this.firstLink([], next);
    817 }
    818};
    819
    820/**
    821 * Gets the first link record on the gateway.
    822 *
    823 * If links Array is provided, the function will add all links recursivly to
    824 * the links Array.
    825 *
    826 * @param {Array} links
    827 * @param {Function} next
    828 */
    8291Insteon.prototype.firstLink = function (links, next) {
    8302 if (typeof links === 'function') {
    8310 next = links;
    8320 links = null;
    833 }
    8342 var insteon = this;
    835
    8362 var deferred = Q.defer();
    8372 deferred.resolve(
    838 insteon.sendCommand('69')
    839 .then(function (status) {
    8402 if (status.ack) {
    8412 if (links && status.response) {
    8422 return insteon.nextLink([status.response.link]);
    843 } else {
    8440 if(status.response) {
    8450 return status.response.link;
    846 } else {
    8470 return null;
    848 }
    849 }
    850 } else {
    8510 return links;
    852 }
    853 })
    854 );
    8552 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    856
    857};
    858
    859/**
    860 * Gets the next link record on the gateway.
    861 *
    862 * If links Array is provided, the function will add all links recursivly to
    863 * the links Array.
    864 *
    865 * @param {Array} links
    866 * @param {Function} next
    867 */
    8681Insteon.prototype.nextLink = function (links, next) {
    8697 if (typeof links === 'function') {
    8700 next = links;
    8710 links = null;
    872 }
    8737 var insteon = this;
    874
    8757 var deferred = Q.defer();
    8767 deferred.resolve(
    877 insteon.sendCommand('6A')
    878 .then(function (status) {
    8797 if (status.ack) {
    8805 if (links && status.response) {
    8815 links.push(status.response.link);
    8825 return insteon.nextLink(links);
    883 } else {
    8840 if(status.response) {
    8850 return status.response.link;
    886 } else {
    8870 return null;
    888 }
    889 }
    890 } else {
    8912 return links;
    892 }
    893 })
    894 );
    8957 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    896};
    897
    898/**
    899 * Gets the link at a memory address on a device.
    900 *
    901 * If links Array is provided, the function will add all links recursivly to
    902 * the links Array.
    903 *
    904 * @param {String} id
    905 * @param {Number} at
    906 * @param {Array} links (optional)
    907 * @param {Function} next
    908 */
    9091Insteon.prototype.linkAt = function (id, at, links, next) {
    91029 if (typeof links === 'function') {
    9110 next = links;
    9120 links = null;
    913 }
    91429 var insteon = this;
    915
    91629 var cmd = {cmd1: '2F', cmd2: '00', extended: true};
    917
    91829 cmd.userData = ['00', '00', toByte(at, 2), '01'];
    919
    920
    92129 var deferred = Q.defer();
    92229 deferred.resolve(
    923 this.directCommand(id, cmd)
    924 .then(function (status) {
    92529 if (status.ack && status.response && status.response.extended) {
    92629 var data = status.response.extended.userData;
    92729 var rawLink = data[5] + data[6] + data[7] + data[8] + data[9] + data[10] + data[11] + data[12];
    92829 var link = parseLinkRecord(rawLink);
    92929 link.at = parseInt(data[2] + data[3], 16);
    930
    93129 if (link.isLast) {
    9327 return links;
    933 }
    93422 if (links) {
    93522 links.push(link);
    93622 return insteon.linkAt(id, at-8, links);
    937 } else {
    9380 return link;
    939 }
    940 } else {
    9410 return links;
    942 }
    943 })
    944 );
    94529 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    946};
    947
    9481Insteon.prototype.writeLinkData = function(id, at, link, next) {
    9496 if (typeof link === 'object' && at) {
    9506 link.at = at;
    951 }
    9526 if (typeof link === 'function' || !link) {
    9530 next = link;
    9540 link = at;
    9550 if(typeof id === 'number') {
    9560 link.at = id;
    9570 id = 'gw';
    958 }
    959 }
    9606 if (typeof at === 'function' || !at) {
    9610 link = id;
    9620 next = at;
    9630 id = 'gw';
    964 }
    965
    966
    9676 debug('writeLinkData - id: %s, link: %j', id, link);
    968
    969 /*in use (bit 7), controller (6), and used (1) */
    9706 var ctrlBits = 1 << 1;
    971
    972 // update (0x20), add controller (0x40), add responder (0x41), delete (0x80)
    9736 var code = '41';
    974
    9756 if(link.controller){
    9762 ctrlBits |= 1 << 6;
    9772 code = '40';
    978 }
    979
    9806 if(link.remove) {
    9812 code = '80';
    982 } else {
    9834 ctrlBits |= 1 << 7;
    984 }
    985
    986
    9876 if(id === 'gw') {
    9880 var manageLinkRecordCmd = {
    989 type: '6F', /*Manage ALL-Link Record*/
    990 code: code,
    991 raw: '026F'+ code + ctrlBits + toByte(link.group) + link.id + link.data.join('')
    992 };
    9930 var insteon = this;
    9940 var deferred = Q.defer();
    995
    9960 deferred.resolve(
    997 insteon.sendCommand(manageLinkRecordCmd)
    998 .then(function (status) {
    9990 if(status.ack || link.remove) {
    10000 return status;
    1001 }
    1002 // Try update since add failed with NACK (already exists)
    10030 code = '20';
    10040 manageLinkRecordCmd = {
    1005 type: '6F', /*Manage ALL-Link Record*/
    1006 code: code,
    1007 raw: '026F'+ code + ctrlBits +
    1008 toByte(link.group) + link.id + link.data.join('')
    1009 };
    1010
    10110 return insteon.sendCommand(manageLinkRecordCmd);
    1012 })
    1013 );
    10140 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1015 } else {
    10166 var cmd = {cmd1: '2F', cmd2: '00', extended: true};
    1017
    10186 cmd.userData = [
    1019 '00',
    1020 '02', /* write */
    1021 toByte(link.at, 2),
    1022 '08', /* length */
    1023 toByte(ctrlBits), /* control bits*/
    1024 toByte(link.group),
    1025 link.id];
    10266 cmd.userData = cmd.userData.concat(link.data);
    10276 cmd.isStandardResponse = true;
    1028
    10296 return this.directCommand(id, cmd, next);
    1030 }
    1031};
    1032
    10331Insteon.prototype.scene = function (controller, responders, options, next) {
    10343 if (typeof options === 'function') {
    10351 next = options;
    10361 options = {};
    1037 }
    10383 options = options || {};
    1039
    10403 utils.assignDefaults({group: 1}, options);
    1041
    10423 responders = responders || [];
    1043
    10443 if(!Array.isArray(responders)) {
    10451 responders = [responders];
    1046 }
    10473 if(typeof controller === 'string') {
    10483 controller = {id: controller};
    1049 }
    10503 controller.controller = true;
    1051
    10523 var devices = [controller];
    1053
    10543 responders.forEach(function (responder, i, arr) {
    10553 if(typeof responder === 'string') {
    10560 responder = {id: responder};
    1057 }
    1058
    10593 if(!responder.data || !Array.isArray(responder.data)) {
    10603 responder.data = ['00', '00', '00'];
    1061 }
    10623 while(responder.data.length < 3){
    10630 responder.data.push('00');
    1064 }
    10653 if(responder.level) {
    10663 responder.data[0] = utils.levelToHexByte(responder.level);
    1067 }
    10683 if(responder.ramp) {
    10693 responder.data[1] = utils.rampRateToHexByte(responder.ramp);
    1070 }
    1071
    10723 arr[i] = responder;
    10733 devices.push(responder);
    1074 });
    1075
    10763 var gw = this;
    1077
    10783 var updateList = [];
    10793 var addList = [];
    10803 var removeList = [];
    1081
    10823 var deferred = Q.defer();
    10833 deferred.resolve(
    1084 gw
    1085 .info()
    1086 .then(function (info) {
    10873 gw.id = info.id;
    10883 gw.info = info;
    1089
    10903 return loadLinks(gw, devices);
    1091 })
    1092 .then(function () {
    1093
    10943 var current = [];
    10953 controller.links.forEach(function (link) {
    109613 if(link.group === options.group && link.controller && link.isInUse) {
    10971 current.push(link.id);
    1098 }
    1099 });
    1100
    11013 var r;
    11023 while(r = responders.pop()) {
    11033 var i = current.indexOf(r.id);
    11043 if(i >= 0) {
    11050 updateList.push(r);
    11060 current.splice(i, 1);
    1107 } else {
    11083 addList.push(r);
    1109 }
    1110 }
    1111
    11123 current.forEach(function (id) {
    11131 removeList.push({id: id});
    1114 });
    1115
    1116
    11173 return modLinks(gw, 'update', controller, options.group, updateList);
    1118 })
    1119 .then( function () {
    11203 return modLinks(gw, 'add', controller, options.group, addList);
    1121 })
    1122 .then(function () {
    11233 if(options.remove) {
    11241 return loadLinks(gw, removeList)
    1125 .then( function () {
    11261 return modLinks(gw, 'remove', controller, options.group, removeList);
    1127 });
    1128 } else {
    11292 return null;
    1130 }
    1131 })
    1132 );
    11333 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1134};
    1135
    11361function loadLinks (gw, devices) {
    1137
    11384 var _loadLinks = function (i) {
    113911 if(devices.length === i) {
    11404 return null;
    1141 }
    11427 var device = devices[i];
    11437 return gw.links(device.id)
    1144 .then(function(links) {
    11457 device.links = links;
    11467 return _loadLinks(i+1);
    1147 });
    1148 };
    1149
    11504 return _loadLinks(0);
    1151}
    1152
    1153
    11541function modLinks(gw, mod, controller, group, responders) {
    1155
    115611 if(responders.length === 0) {
    11577 return null;
    1158 }
    1159
    11604 var responder = responders.pop();
    1161
    1162
    11634 var code, ctrlBits;
    11644 switch (mod) {
    1165 case 'add':
    11663 code = '41';
    11673 ctrlBits = '82';/* in use and used*/
    11683 break;
    1169 case 'update':
    11700 code = '20';
    11710 ctrlBits = '82';/* in use and used*/
    11720 break;
    1173 case 'remove':
    11741 code = '80';
    11751 ctrlBits = '02'; /* clear in use */
    11761 break;
    1177 }
    1178
    11794 if(responder.id === 'gw') {
    11800 var manageLinkRecordCmd = {
    1181 type: '6F', /*Manage ALL-Link Record*/
    1182 code: code,
    1183 raw: '026F'+ code + ctrlBits +
    1184 toByte(group) + controller.id + responder.data.join('')
    1185 };
    1186
    11870 return gw
    1188 .sendCommand(manageLinkRecordCmd)
    1189 .then(function() {
    11900 if(mod === 'update') { // no need to update controller links
    11910 return modLinks(gw, mod, controller, group, responders);
    1192 } else {
    11930 return modCtlLink(gw, mod, controller, group, responder, responders);
    1194 }
    1195 });
    1196 } else {
    11974 var ctrlID = controller.id;
    11984 if(controller.id === 'gw') {
    11992 ctrlID = gw.id;
    1200 }
    1201
    1202 // figure out where to write the record
    1203 // if it new then find the first unused or sub 8 from last
    1204 // if it update or remove find the address of the existing record
    12054 var at = 4095; /* 0x0FFF */
    12064 var i, l;
    12074 if(mod === 'add') {
    12083 for (i = responder.links.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    120910 l = responder.links[i];
    121010 if (!l.isInUse) {
    12111 at = l.at;
    12121 break;
    1213 }
    12149 if (l.at <= at) {
    12153 at = l.at - 8;
    1216 }
    1217 }
    1218 } else {
    12191 for (i = responder.links.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    12203 l = responder.links[i];
    12213 if(!l.controller && l.group === group && l.id === ctrlID) {
    12221 at = l.at;
    12231 break;
    1224 }
    1225 }
    1226 }
    1227
    12284 var link = {
    1229 group: group,
    1230 id: ctrlID,
    1231 data: responder.data,
    1232 controller: false,
    1233 remove: (mod === 'remove')
    1234 };
    1235
    12364 return gw
    1237 .writeLinkData(responder.id, at, link)
    1238 .then(function() {
    12394 if(mod === 'update') { // no need to update controller links
    12400 return modLinks(gw, mod, controller, group, responders);
    1241 } else {
    12424 return modCtlLink(gw, mod, controller, group, responder, responders);
    1243 }
    1244 });
    1245 }
    1246
    1247}
    1248
    12491function modCtlLink(gw, mod, controller, group, responder, responders) {
    1250
    1251
    12524 var code, ctrlBits;
    12534 switch (mod) {
    1254 case 'add':
    12553 code = '40';
    12563 ctrlBits = 'C2';/* in use (bit 7), controller (6), and used (1) */
    12573 break;
    1258 case 'update':
    12590 code = '20';
    12600 ctrlBits = 'C2';/* in use (bit 7), controller (6), and used (1) */
    12610 break;
    1262 case 'remove':
    12631 code = '80';
    12641 ctrlBits = '02'; /* clear in use */
    12651 break;
    1266 }
    1267
    12684 if(controller.id === 'gw') {
    12692 var manageLinkRecordCmd = {
    1270 type: '6F', /*Manage ALL-Link Record*/
    1271 code: code, /* Add new Controller code */
    1272 raw: '026F' + code + ctrlBits + toByte(group) + responder.id + responder.data.join('')
    1273 };
    1274
    12752 return gw
    1276 .sendCommand(manageLinkRecordCmd)
    1277 .then(function () {
    12782 return modLinks(gw, mod, controller, group, responders);
    1279 });
    1280 } else {
    12812 var rspdID = responder.id;
    12822 if(responder.id === 'gw') {
    12830 rspdID = gw.id;
    1284 }
    12852 var at = 4095; /* 0x0FFF */
    12862 var i, l;
    12872 if(mod === 'add') {
    12881 for (i = controller.links.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    12894 l = controller.links[i];
    12904 if (!l.isInUse) {
    12911 at = l.at;
    12921 break;
    1293 }
    12943 if (l.at <= at) {
    12951 at = l.at - 8;
    1296 }
    1297 }
    1298 } else {
    12991 for (i = controller.links.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    13004 l = controller.links[i];
    13014 if(l.controller && l.group === group && l.id === rspdID) {
    13021 at = l.at;
    13031 break;
    1304 }
    1305 }
    1306 }
    1307
    13082 var link = {
    1309 group: group,
    1310 id: rspdID,
    1311 data: responder.data,
    1312 controller: true,
    1313 remove: (mod === 'remove')
    1314 };
    1315
    13162 return gw
    1317 .writeLinkData(controller.id, at, link)
    1318 .then(function () {
    13192 return modLinks(gw, mod, controller, group, responders);
    1320 });
    1321 }
    1322}
    1323

    13281Insteon.prototype.sendAllLinkCmd = function (group, command, next) {
    13296 var sendAllLinkCmd = {
    1330 type: '61',
    1331 group: group,
    1332 command: command,
    1333 raw: '0261'+ toByte(group) + command + '00'
    1334 };
    1335
    1336
    13376 var deferred = Q.defer();
    13386 deferred.resolve(
    1339 this.sendCommand(sendAllLinkCmd)
    1340 .then(function (status) {
    13416 return status.report;
    1342 })
    1343 );
    13446 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1345};

    13841Insteon.prototype.info = function (id, next) {
    13855 if (typeof id === 'function') {
    13861 next = id;
    13871 id = null;
    1388 }
    13895 var deferred = Q.defer();
    1390
    13915 if (id){
    13921 var cmd = {cmd1: '03', cmd2: '00', waitForExtended: true};
    13931 deferred.resolve(
    1394 this.directCommand(id, cmd)
    1395 .then(function onDeviceProfileRequest(status) {
    13961 debug('Info: %j', status);
    13971 if (!status.response || !status.response.standard) {
    13980 return null;
    1399 }
    14001 if (!status.response.extended) {
    14010 return {id: status.response.standard.id}; // not all device support the ED response
    1402 }
    1403
    14041 return buildInfo(status.response.extended);
    1405 })
    1406 );
    1407 } else {
    14084 deferred.resolve(
    1409 this.sendCommand('60')
    1410 .then( function (status) {
    14114 return status.response;
    1412 })
    1413 );
    1414 }
    14155 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1416};
    1417
    1418
    14191function buildInfo(resp) {
    14201 var info = {
    1421 id: resp.id,
    1422 productKey: resp.userData[1] + resp.userData[2] + resp.userData[3],
    1423 deviceCategory: {id: parseInt(resp.userData[4], 16)},
    1424 deviceSubcategory: {id: parseInt(resp.userData[5], 16)},
    1425 isDimmable: false,
    1426 isLighting: false,
    1427 isThermostat: false
    1428 };
    1429
    14301 if (info.deviceCategory.id < DEV_CAT_NAMES.length) {
    14311 info.deviceCategory.name = DEV_CAT_NAMES[info.deviceCategory.id];
    1432 }
    1433
    14341 switch(info.deviceCategory.id) {
    1435 case 1:
    14361 info.isDimmable = true;
    14371 info.isLighting = true;
    14381 break;
    1439 case 2:
    14400 info.isLighting = true;
    14410 break;
    1442 case 5:
    14430 info.isThermostat = true;
    1444 }
    1445
    14461 return info;
    1447}
    1448
    14491Insteon.prototype.version = function(id, next) {
    14501 var deferred = Q.defer();
    14511 deferred.resolve(
    1452 this.directCommand(id, '0D')
    1453 .then(function recievedVersion(status) {
    14541 if (!status || !status.response || !status.response.standard) {
    14550 return null;
    1456 }
    14571 var resp = status.response.standard;
    14581 var version = {
    1459 code: parseInt(resp.command2, 16),
    1460 name: utils.VERSIONS[resp.command2]
    1461 };
    14621 return version;
    1463 })
    1464 );
    14651 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1466};
    1467

    14691Insteon.prototype.ping = function(id, next) {
    14701 var deferred = Q.defer();
    14711 deferred.resolve(
    1472 this.directCommand(id, '0F')
    1473 .then(function recievedVersion(status) {
    14741 if (!status || !status.response || !status.response.standard) {
    14750 return null;
    1476 }
    14771 return status.response.standard;
    1478 })
    1479 );
    14801 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1481};

    14900 if (!status || !status.response || !status.response.standard) {
    14910 return null;
    1492 }
    14930 return status.response.standard;
    1494 })
    1495 );
    14960 return deferred.promise.nodeify(next);
    1497};

    531function levelToHexByte(level) {
    545 if (level < 0 || level > 100) {
    551 throw new Error('level must be between 0 and 100');
    56 }
    57 // scale level to a max of 0xFF (255)
    584 level = ~~ (255 * level / 100);
    59
    604 return toByte(level);
    61
    62}
    63
    641function levelToHexHalfByte(level) {
    655 if (level < 0 || level > 100) {
    660 throw new Error('level must be between 0 and 100');
    67 }
    68 // scale level to a max of 0xF (15)
    695 level = ~~ (15 * level / 100);
    70
    715 return level.toString(16).toUpperCase();
    72
    73}
    74
    75
    761function lookupRampRateIndex(rate) {
    77
    7810 for(var i = 1; i < RAMP_RATES.length; i++) {
    79224 if (rate >= RAMP_RATES[i]) {
    809 return i;
    81 }
    82 }
    83
    841 return RAMP_RATES.length - 1;
    85}
    86
    871function rampRateToHexByte(rate) {
    883 return toByte(lookupRampRateIndex(rate));
    89}
    90
    911function rampRateToHexHalfByte(rate) {
    927 return (~~((lookupRampRateIndex(rate))/2)).toString(16).toUpperCase();
    93}
    94
    951function toByte(value, length) {
    96141 length = length || 1;
    97141 value = value.toString(16).toUpperCase();
    98141 var pad = new Array((length * 2) + 1).join('0');
    99141 return pad.substring(0, pad.length - value.length) + value;
    100}
    101
    1021function assignDefaults(defaults, options) {
    1039 if (!options) {
    1041 options = defaults;
    1051 return options;
    106 }
    1078 for(var key in defaults) {
    10823 options[key] = (typeof options[key] === 'undefined') ? defaults[key] : options[key];
    109 }
    110
    1118 return options;
    112}
    113
    1141function convertTemp(from, to, val) {
    1153 if(from === to) {
    1162 return val;
    117 }
    118
    1191 if(from === 'F') {
    1200 var c = (val - 32) * 5/9;
    1210 if(to === 'K') {
    1220 return c + 273.15;
    123 }
    1240 return c;
    125 }
    126
    1271 if(from === 'K') {
    1280 val = val - 273.15;
    129 }
    130
    1311 if(to === 'C') {
    1320 return val;
    133 }
    134
    1351 return (val * 9/5) + 32;
    136}
